Hi Influencer connects brands with top influencers for authentic marketing. Clients can create campaigns, and influencers can apply to them. We manage communication, payments, and performance tracking.

patterns: I want to create an account
responses: You can sign up by clicking the 'Get Started' or 'Join Now' button on the homepage. Choose whether you're an influencer or a client.
You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link. If you're still having trouble, contact support.

patterns: How do I create a campaign?
responses: To create a campaign, log in as a client and click 'Create Campaign'. You'll be guided through setting your goals, budget, and selecting influencer criteria.
Use our influencer search tool to filter by niche, audience, platform, and engagement. You can also post a campaign and let influencers apply.
You can view your active campaigns and influencer applications from the dashboard under 'My Campaigns'.
We offer flexible pricing depending on campaign size. Influencer fees vary, and we take a small platform fee. Contact sales for custom pricing.
Go to the 'Available Campaigns' section after logging in as an influencer. You can apply with a short pitch and your rates.
Payments are released after campaign deliverables are approved. We process payments via PayPal or bank transfer within 7–10 business days.

patterns: How do I collaborate with brands?
responses: You can apply to campaigns posted by brands, or be invited directly. Make sure your profile is complete and engaging!

patterns: Why am I not getting campaigns?
responses: Add a clear bio, upload recent content, and link your social platforms. Brands are more likely to choose complete and active profiles.
You can reach our support team at support@hiinfluencer.com or use the live chat. We usually respond within a few hours.

patterns: How do I verify my account?
responses: Verification helps build trust with brands. Submit your ID and link your social accounts to get verified.

patterns: How do you handle my data?
responses: We prioritize your privacy. You can read our full privacy policy at /privacy. Your data is never shared without consent.
We make influencer marketing easy — with campaign tools, performance tracking, verified profiles, and a dedicated support team.
We support Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and Twitter. You can link multiple platforms to your profile.

patterns: Is the platform available in other languages?
responses: We currently support English and are working on adding more languages soon. Stay tuned!
Absolutely! You can schedule a call with our team using the 'Book a Demo' link on our site.

patterns: Where can I see campaign analytics?
responses: You can access performance metrics from your campaign dashboard, including impressions, reach, engagement rate, and ROI.

patterns: What categories of influencers do you have?
responses: Yes! We support various categories including fashion, fitness, tech, lifestyle, parenting, travel, and more. Use filters in the search tool to refine results.

patterns: Can I invite a specific influencer?
How do I collaborate with someone I found online?
Collaborate with someone not on platform
responses: Yes, you can invite external influencers using their email or social handle. They'll receive a link to join and accept your campaign invite.

patterns: Can others manage campaigns with me?
responses: You can invite teammates to your account with roles like Admin, Editor, or Viewer. Go to Account > Team to manage roles.

patterns: Do you have a help center?
responses: Yes! Visit our Help Center at /help or click the '?' icon in the app for quick access to guides and tutorials.
All campaigns are reviewed for quality and compliance. Most are approved within 24 hours. If rejected, you’ll receive an explanation and can revise it.
Influencers are rated based on campaign success, brand feedback, and engagement metrics. Brands can leave private reviews post-campaign.
Yes. Our platform encourages proper disclosure by influencers, including FTC-compliant tags and language for every platform.
We use AI to suggest top influencers based on your campaign’s industry, goals, budget, and audience preferences. You can approve or reject matches.

patterns: How to stop a live campaign?
responses: You can cancel campaigns from the dashboard under ‘My Campaigns’. Depending on the stage, partial fees may apply. Contact support for help.

patterns: How do I report a problem?
responses: We're sorry you're experiencing issues. Please use the in-app feedback form or email bugs@hiinfluencer.com to report the problem.
Yes! Agencies can manage multiple influencers or brands under one dashboard. Contact our sales team to set up an agency account.

patterns: What kinds of campaigns can I run?
responses: You can run campaigns for stories, posts, reels, videos, and even live collaborations. Format options depend on platform and creator preference.

patterns: I got rejected for a campaign
responses: Brands choose influencers based on fit, timing, and budget. If rejected, you’re free to apply to other campaigns or improve your profile to increase chances.

patterns: How do I delete my account?
I want to leave the platform
responses: We're sad to see you go. To delete your account, go to Settings > Privacy. You can also email delete@hiinfluencer.com for full removal.

patterns: Is Hi Influencer available in my country?
Can I use this from India?
responses: Hi Influencer is available worldwide. Influencers and brands from all regions are welcome to join and collaborate globally.
Campaign deadlines and schedules automatically convert to each user’s local time zone. You can specify preferred posting windows when creating a campaign.
